title: How to Contact eBay Support: Email or Chat with a Representative

steps.title: Go to eBay.com.
steps.content: Go to eBay.com . If you are not automatically logged in, enter your username and password.

steps.title: Click on Help & Contact.
steps.content: Click on Help & Contact . The link is in the upper left corner of the window.

steps.title: Click on Contact us.
steps.content: Click on Contact us . This blue button appears in the lower right of the window.

steps.title: Click on a category.
steps.content: Click on a category. Choose the category that best describes the reason you wish to contact eBay: Buying; Selling; Account; Returns; or Fees & Billing.

steps.title: Click on a topic.
steps.content: Click on a topic. Once you've chosen a category, you'll be given a series of topics from which to select.

steps.title: Click on a subtopic.
steps.content: Click on a subtopic.

steps.title: Click on a contact option.
steps.content: Click on a contact option. After you choose a subtopic, the contact options will display at the bottom of the window. Select the one that best suits you: Call Us , Call Me or Ask the Community . Scroll down past the tips, hints and FAQs that eBay will display in order to see the contact options.
